title: A novel fluorescent probe with a phosphofluorene molecular structure for selective detection of hydrogen sulfide in living cells
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,20966-20973
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02979H, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Shuntao Zhang, Xingyong Liu, Xiangjun Chen, Jiefeng Tang, Juan Wang
The fluorescent probe PPF-CDNB based on the asymmetric π-conjugated phosphine structure of phosphorfluorene can highly selectively and sensitively detect hydrogen sulfide in live cells, and exhibits a significant fluorescence enhancement effect.
